story_20_07000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Think you can beat us all alone, huh, kid?
Hah! Don’t be stupid!
story_20_07000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Things’re different now! We can call up strong
Pokémon to battle for us whenever we want now!
story_20_07000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Give it up, kid! You can’t win by yourself!
Leave your Pokémon where we can see it
and scram. Got it?!
story_20_07000/2401_1001_0500_10: I don’t care how strong you are...
story_20_07000/2401_1001_0600_10:
I won’t give up until I rescue those poor Pokémon
that you’ve stolen from their Trainers!
story_20_07000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Wipe that self-righteous look off your face...
It’s makin’ me cringe.
story_20_07000/2401_1001_0800_10:
You wanna play hardball? Fine, you got it!
You’re gonna regret not runnin’ away while
you had the chance, kid!
story_20_07000/2401_1001_1100_10:
We told you this would be too dangerous alone.
Let us fight with you!
story_20_07000/2401_1001_1300_10:
These thugs are way stronger than we thought...
I’ll hold them off here!
story_20_07000/2401_1001_1500_10: What?! Did you even hear what I just said?!
story_20_07000/2401_1001_1800_10: No! We can’t just leave you, Calem!
story_20_07000/2401_1001_2100_10:
I know why you’re doing this. You want to do
as much as you can because we’ve got the
tournament ahead of us.
story_20_07000/2401_1001_2200_10:
But you’re forgetting that we want to help
you, too. We’re your friends, Calem!
story_20_07000/2401_1001_2400_10:
Of course we are! There are some things you
just can’t do all by yourself... That’s where
friends like us come in!
story_20_07000/2401_1001_2500_10: That’s why I really, really, really...
story_20_07000/2401_1001_2600_10: reeeally wish you’d let Big Sis help you!
story_20_07000/2401_1001_2800_10: Oof! What I meant to say was...
story_20_07000/2401_1001_3000_10:
You’re totally right... I can’t believe I forgot
something so simple.
story_20_07000/2401_1001_3100_10:
Come on, everyone! Let’s battle these thugs
together—and rescue those stolen Pokémon!
story_20_07000/2401_0401_0100_10: All right! Hope you’re ready, Team Break!
story_20_07000/2401_0402_0100_10: All right! Hope you’re ready, Team Break!
story_20_07000/2401_1001_3200_10:
Pffft! Think you’re better than us now
that you’ve got “Big Sis” to help you?
Hah! Don’t make me laugh!
story_20_07000/2401_1001_3300_10: Come on! Bet we’ll beat you at your own game!
